entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 10 this morning and minus 17 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 40%

entry.title: Friday: Clearing. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
